text:
The -q command-line flag allows one to define an additional properties file.

Or one can create a user.properties file.

See:

http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/get-started.html#options

and

http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/get-started.html#configuring_jmeter
creator: sebb@apache.org
